kpi.name: M1006C298

kpi_info.title: DCH STATE ALLOCATION FAILURES FOR PTT
kpi_info.use: The number of failed PTT call attempts in the cell. UPDATED:When CELL_DCH state allocation for PTT RAB is not possible due to RRC: Radio Bearer Reconfiguration failure/ a second RRC: Cell update message is received from the UE in same cell/ no response from PTT UE to RRC: Radio Bearer Reconfiguration.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH STATE ALLOCATION FAILURES FOR PTT
